Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.factory

Class TypeDataBinderAdapter<T,E extends Enum<E>,VB extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<?>>

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<VH>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.DynamicRecyclerViewAdapter<RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.DynamicBinderAdapter<VB>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.DynamicTypeBinderAdapter<E,VB>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.factory.TypeDataBinderAdapter<T,E,VB>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the data this adapter will receive.
E - The type of the enum this adapter will receive.
VB - The type of the dynamic recycler view binder.
Direct Known Subclasses:
TypeQueryBinderAdapter
public abstract class TypeDataBinderAdapter<T,E extends Enum<E>,VB extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<?>> extends DynamicTypeBinderAdapter<E,VB>
A DynamicTypeBinderAdapter to handle the generic data that can be used with the DynamicDataBinder.
